title: Geographic and demographic correlates of autism-related anti
author: Tomeny; Theodore S; Vargo; Christopher J; El-Toukhy; Sherine
description: This study examines temporal trends, geographic distribution, and demographic correlates of anti-vaccine beliefs on Twitter, 2009-2015. A total of 549,972 tweets were downloaded and coded for the pres
cleaned_text: of autism-related anti-vaccine beliefs on Twitter, 2009-15 Download full text from publisher As the access to this document is restricted, you may want to [search](/cgi-bin/htsearch?q=%22Geographic+and+demographic+correlates+of+autism+related+anti+vaccine+beliefs+on+Twitter++2009+15%22) for a different version of it.
